content:
Craft an item of type: red_wool
inventory=[{"type": "scute", "quantity": 47, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_sandstone_wall", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "comparator", "quantity": 39, "index": 36}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "poppy", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft red_wool I need to first craft red_dye. To do so, I need to move the poppy from slot 39 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_wool
inventory=[{"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "poppy", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 47, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_sandstone_wall", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "comparator", "quantity": 39, "index": 36}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}]
thought: The red_dye has been crafted, so I need to move it from slot 0 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_wool
inventory=[{"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 47, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_sandstone_wall", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "comparator", "quantity": 39, "index": 36}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft red_wool. Red_wool requires placing 1 red_dye and 1 white_wool side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the red_dye from slot 11 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_wool
inventory=[{"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 47, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_sandstone_wall", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "comparator", "quantity": 39, "index": 36}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}]

thought: Since the red_dye has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the white_wool to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the white_wool to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_wool
inventory=[{"type": "red_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "red_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "scute", "quantity": 47, "index": 13}, {"type": "red_sandstone_wall", "quantity": 27, "index": 26}, {"type": "comparator", "quantity": 39, "index": 36}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}]
thought: Now I can craft the red_wool by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
